metadata.title: CVE-2018-16469 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.description: The merge.recursive function in the merge package <1.2.1 can be tricked into adding or modifying properties of the Object prototype. These properties will be present on all objects allowing for a denial of service attack.

criterions.comment: node-merge package in hirsute is affected and needs fixing.
